query.pigql: q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate daysBetween( now(), toDate("{{cell(LastYear_1.result, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Year").asString()}}"+"-"+"{{cell(DUE_DATE1_Month_1.selection, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Month").asString()}}"+"-"+"{{cell(DAyS_1.selection, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Day").asString()}}", "yyyy-MM-dd")) as 'End_Days';

q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate case when month_days(now())!=31 && "{{cell(DAyS_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE1_Day").asObject()}}" in ["29"] then ({{cell(DayDiffLastMonth_3.result,0,"avg_DueDateDay").asObject()}}*-1)-2 when month_days(now())!=31 && "{{cell(DAyS_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE1_Day").asObject()}}" in ["30"] then ({{cell(DayDiffLastMonth_3.result,0,"avg_DueDateDay").asObject()}}*-1)-1 when month_days(now())!=31 && "{{cell(DAyS_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE1_Day").asObject()}}" in ["31"] then {{cell(DayDiffLastMonth_3.result,0,"avg_DueDateDay").asObject()}}*-1 else {{cell(step_DaysMTD_1.result,0,"Day_Diff").asObject()}} end as 'Day_Value';

q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE1_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE1_Year' as 'DUE_DATE1_Year', avg('DueDateYear') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE1_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(DUE_DATE1_Year_1.selection,["DUE_DATE1_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE1_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE1_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE1_Year' as 'DUE_DATE1_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DueDateYear') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then -2 else ((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-1)-2 end) as 'Year_Diff';

q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate daysBetween( now(), toDate("{{cell(DUE_DATE1_Year_1.selection, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Year").asString()}}"+"-"+"{{cell(DUE_DATE1_Month_1.selection, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Month").asString()}}"+"-"+"{{cell(DAyS_1.selection, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Day").asString()}}", "yyyy-MM-dd")) as 'End_Days';

q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate (case when "{{cell(DUE_DATE1_Month_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE1_Month").asObject()}}" in ["01", "02", "03", "04","05","06"] then daysBetween( now(), toDate("{{cell(LastYear_1.result, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Year").asString()}}"+"-"+"07"+"-"+"01", "yyyy-MM-dd")) else daysBetween( now(), toDate("{{cell(DUE_DATE1_Year_1.selection, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Year").asString()}}"+"-"+"07"+"-"+"01", "yyyy-MM-dd")) end) as 'Start_Days';

q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate (case when "{{cell(DUE_DATE1_Month_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE1_Month").asObject()}}" in ["01", "02", "03", "04","05","06"] then daysBetween( now(), toDate("{{cell(LastToLastYear_1.result, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Year").asString()}}"+"-"+"07"+"-"+"01", "yyyy-MM-dd")) else daysBetween( now(), toDate("{{cell(LastYear_1.result, 0, "DUE_DATE1_Year").asString()}}"+"-"+"07"+"-"+"01", "yyyy-MM-dd")) end) as 'Start_Days';

q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q1 = group q by 'DUE_DATE1_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'DUE_DATE1_Year' as 'DUE_DATE1_Year', avg('DueDateYear') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'DUE_DATE1_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(DUE_DATE1_Year_1.selection,["DUE_DATE1_Year"]).asEquality("DUE_DATE1_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'DUE_DATE1_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'DUE_DATE1_Year' as 'DUE_DATE1_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('DueDateYear') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then -1 else ((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-1)-1 end) as 'Year_Diff';

q = load "FInal_QAD_BUdget_Invoice_Dataset"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate case when month_days(now())!=31 && "{{cell(DAyS_1.selection,0,"DUE_DATE1_Day").asObject()}}" in ["29","30","31"] then -1 else 0 end as 'Month_Value';

q = load "Datetime1"; q1 = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current day".."current day"]; q1 = group q1 by 'Date_Day';  q1 = foreach q1 generate 'Date_Day' as 'Date_Day', avg('DateDay') as 'avg_CurrentDay', 0 as 'avg_DateDay';  q2 = filter q by  {{column(DAyS_1.selection,["DUE_DATE1_Day"]).asEquality("Date_Day")}};  q2 = group q2 by 'Date_Day';  q2 = foreach q2 generate 'Date_Day' as 'Date_Day', 0 as 'avg_CurrentDay', avg('DateDay') as 'avg_DateDay';  u = union q1,q2;  u = group u by all;  u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DateDay')> 31 then 0 else (sum('avg_DateDay')-sum('avg_CurrentDay')) end) as 'Day_Diff';
